binding:binding.name: Mycroft Binding
binding:binding.description: Connect to the Mycroft message bus in order to receive information from, and send command to Mycroft. Typical usage includes triggering Mycroft to listen (as if a wake word was detected), sending text for Mycroft to speak, reacting on some specific intent, command skills by faking a spoken utterance, etc.
binding:binding.author: Gwendal ROULLEAU
